pageContext.description: Small part consisting of lower part of one wing of blade, (including barb) and part of the socket. Flat oval-section socket, with only very slight prominence for mid-rib, from which the blade tapers evenly towards the edge; small amount of socket runs below the barb. Small notch missing from edge.
pageContext.patina: Thin green patina, most of surface is a dull brown.
pageContext.surface: Smooth, except for a few patches of crystallisation.
pageContext.associations: 2 socketed celts + 5 fragts; 2 socketed gouges + 1 fragment; 1 socket knife fragment; 3 sword fragts; 1 ferrule + 1 fragt; 1 copper cake + 25 metal lumps.
pageContext.toSearch: Flansham, Bognor Regis, West Sussex Po22, UK
